entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
